Package soot.jimple.infoflow.data

Class Abstraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.data.Abstraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, FastSolverLinkedNode<Abstraction,​soot.Unit>
    public class Abstraction
extends Object
implements Cloneable, FastSolverLinkedNode<Abstraction,​soot.Unit>
    The abstraction class contains all information that is necessary to track the taint.
    Author:
    Steven Arzt, Christian Fritz

      • postdominators

        protected List<IInfoflowCFG.UnitContainer> postdominators
        The postdominators we need to pass in order to leave the current conditional branch. Do not use the synchronized Stack class here to avoid deadlocks.

      • dominator

        protected soot.Unit dominator

      • isImplicit

        protected boolean isImplicit

      • dependsOnCutAP

        protected boolean dependsOnCutAP
        Only valid for inactive abstractions. Specifies whether an access paths has been cut during alias analysis.

        protected int propagationPathLength

                      Abstraction original)

        Parameters:
        p - The access path for the new abstraction
        original - The original abstraction to copy

        public Abstraction getActiveCopy()
        Description copied from interface: FastSolverLinkedNode
        If this abstraction supports alias analysis, this returns the active copy of the current abstraction. Otherwise, "this" is returned.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • entails

        public boolean entails​(Abstraction other)
        Checks whether this abstraction entails the given abstraction, i.e. this taint also taints everything that is tainted by the given taint.
        Parameters:
        other - The other taint abstraction
        Returns:
        True if this object at least taints everything that is also tainted by the given object
